award_title: Collaborative Research: NeTS: Medium: Resilient Multi-User Mobile sub-THz Networks using Near-Field Wavefronts
subject: Getting credit when people actually use your simulation code
body:
Simulation outputs from near-field propagation models get massive fast, and sharing them across collaborating institutions usually means Dropbox links that die or "just run it yourself" (if the cluster configs match).

Ouro's a platform we built so researchers can share computational tools and datasets in a way that's actually usable long-termâ€”not zip files in supplementary materials. Others can cite your work AND you see when they actually use it.

Worth a quick call after the holidays?

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
